paragraphs: In celebration of the launch of our new barding services, we are offering a free set of horse armor to the bearer of this letter. To retrieve your reward bring your favorite horse, along with this notice, to the Chestnut Handy Stables outside of the Imperial City. Help us spread the word about our new horse armor services.
Chestnut Handy -- Because you can't afford not to protect your horse.

Snak gra-Bura
Owner, Chestnut Handy Stables
